attributes.action: British style operating system for British computers
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the current, American operating systems are far too rude and unhelpful. It annoys millions of Britons when they are told that they haven't plugged in a USB device when they know fine well that they have, an example of this is when a computer can't detect a webcam. They are told, without fear of contradiction that "There is no webcam connected to the computer", I personally believe that this is far too rude a way to treat computer users, I think that the government should work with computer companies to create a British operating system which would say something along the lines of "I'm very sorry, I can't detect a webcam, my fault, not yours". WAKE UP BRITAIN!
